comment.author: 25889396@N02
comment._content:
If this is correctly identified Nigeria (and other pics with the Gedam tag) it is likely to be Gidam, southwest of Maiduguri, NOT Sudan. That would be within easy distance of the album owner's home. [http://www.flickr.com/photos/nationalarchives/5424656433/in/set-72157625850393609/] 
 
OR Geidam, on the river Yobe, well NE of Nafada, the album owner's home.
